common.label.name: Cristian Grosu
landing-page.label.welcome: Hi, I am Cristian. Nice to meet you!
landing-page.label.description1: Enthusiastic, responsible, and technically skilled candidate with good problem - solving abilities,self-motivated and self-directed.
landing-page.label.description2: I am able to stay focused on the ultimate goal and continue to work toward that result. Productive in both self-managed and team-based projects .
landing-page.label.description3: Self-starter and a team player. I am able to work in a team environment and have the ability to work independently.
landing-page.label.description4: Quickly learn new technologies and paying big attention to details.I am able to work well under pressure,to accomplish tasks under minimal direction and supervision and to adhere to strict deadlines.
landing-page.label.description5: Currently very interested in Artificial Intelligence, Full stack Web Development and Data Analysis.
landing-page.message.skills.dialog.ai-de: This is the field in witch took my bachelor thesis.
I prefer to work in Python because of its libraries, however I can implement AI algorithms in all other languages specified in this portfolio.
Application developed for my bachelor thesis
Publication at Student Scientific Communication Session (Conference)
Article submitted at Mathematics scientific journal (July 2021)
landing-page.message.skills.dialog.andro: Good knowledge in order to make a mobile application in Android studio.Also can make IOS applications through Ionic framework.
(an application for blood donators made with a team of 5 people)
landing-page.message.skills.dialog.game-: Game Development is a just hobby at the moment.
However I can make a good indie game in Unity.
One of my game made with Unity =>
landing-page.message.skills.dialog.web-d: I like to code things from scratch, and enjoy bringing ideas to life in the browser.
//Todo project (to do is the name of the project)
A site where people search recipes by products they have,with opportunity to scan products directly through barcode. A project made with Typescript,Ionic,React and C#(.Net)
education-page.label.education1.name: High school "Vasile Alexandri"
education-page.label.education2.name: Bachelor degree at faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science
education-page.label.education2.thesis: Bachelor thesis topic: Applications of artificial intelligence in evolutionary art.
education-page.label.education3.name: Master degree at faculty of Computer Science
work-experience-page.label.work-experien: Full stack web developer at Do it big agency
At this company I was involved in developing web applications for food delivery and restaurants.
Angular, Angular Material, TypeScript, Node.js (with Nest.js), PostgreSQL, AWS services

This is a mobile application was initially developed together with a team of 2 programmers and 2 business specialists during a hackathon and after that perfected and placed on Play Market. The application is a network for blood donors that bring together people who need blood and who are ready to donate this blood for them.
I was the project manager of a 4 programmers team. The project was a to develop an app for services appointments, both on mobile and web platforms.
At this company I was involved in web development projects that required knowledge of Java language both on back-end (Spring Framework) and on front-end (Vaadin).

Paper "Optimization algorithms in autonomous art generation." presented at Student Scientific Communication Session (Conference) Cluj-Napoca, Romania 2021.
